p: The essential oils of H. brasiliense presented clear inhibition zones corresponding to antifungal activity in the limit of detection against Cladosporium cladosporioides and C. sphaerospermum ( Figure 2). Female flowers presented the strongest activity for both fungi from 200 μg until 25 μg of essential oil tested, but the other oils presented weaker inhibition, up to 50 μg against C. sphaerospermum and to 25 μg against C. cladosporioides.
